title: As Syrian Rebels Topple Assad Regime, How It May Impact Russia-Ukraine War
content: The five decades of Baath rule in Syria ended on Sunday as Islamist-led rebels declared that they had taken Damascus, sending President Bashar al-Assad fleeing.
summary: The five decades of Baath rule in Syria ended on Sunday as Islamist-led rebels declared that they had taken Damascus, sending President Bashar al-Assad fleeing.

title: United Airlines Offers Free 'Fantasy Flights' To See Santa At North Pole
content: Children with cancer or who have been orphaned by the loss of someone on active duty are taken aboard the short flight to the fantasy land.

title: The Who's Who Of Al-Assads: Inside Syria's Most Powerful Family
content: Behind the smoke and chaos of Syria's ongoing turmoil, the Al-Assad family stands as the untouchable core -- a dynasty that has moulded the country's fate for over half a century. At the centre is Bashar al-Assad.
summary: Behind the smoke and chaos of Syria's ongoing turmoil, the Al-Assad family stands as the untouchable core -- a dynasty that has moulded the country's fate for over half a century. At the centre is Bashar al-Assad.

title: The Rise Of Ba'ath Party And How It Solidified Its Hold On Syria
content: Since Hafez al-Assad seized power in 1971, Syria's political structure has been dominated by three key pillars: the Ba'ath Party, the Alawite minority, and the Syrian Army.
summary: Since Hafez al-Assad seized power in 1971, Syria's political structure has been dominated by three key pillars: the Ba'ath Party, the Alawite minority, and the Syrian Army.

title: Elon Musk's Grok AI Chatbot Now Free For All Users, But Has Limits

title: How Syrian Teen's Graffiti Became Bashar Al-Assad's Writing On The Wall
content: In early 2011, in the streets of Daraa, southern Syria, a teenager's rebellious act against an authoritarian regime triggered a civil war that reshaped the country's destiny.

title: Where Is Bashar Al-Assad? Questions Over Syrian President's Whereabouts
content: A Syria war monitor said that President Bashar al-Assad has left the country, after losing swathes of territory to a lightning offensive led by an Islamist-led rebel coalition that said it entered Damascus on Sunday.

title: Video: Statues Of Bashar Al-Assad's Father Dragged Through Syria Roads
content: As Syrian President Bashar Al Assad fled the country amid a regime change and rebel forces moved in, statues of his father and former President Hafez Al-Assad in and around the capital were pulled down by protesters welcoming the rebel fighters.

title: Fall Of Assads: How An Alawite Family Ruled Over A Sunni Nation For Decades
content: The Assads have ruled Syria for over half a century. Today, rebel forces have breached their seat of power Damascus, prompting President Bashar al-Assad to flee and effectively ending the family's rule over Syria.

title: Syria's Mohammed Al-Jolani: Leader Of Rebel Alliance Who Led Assad's Downfall
content: Abu Mohammed al-Jolani is the leader of the Islamist alliance that spearheaded an offensive that rebels say brought down President Bashar al-Assad and ended five decades of Baath Party rule in Syria.

title: What's Happening In Syria? 5 Big Developments As Rebels Take Over

title: Israeli Army Assists UN Forces In 'Repelling Attack' In Syria

title: Hamas Releases Video Of Israeli Hostage, Mother Demands "Comprehensive Deal"
